title: Screamland
description:
Just in time for Halloween...

When SFX and slasher movies become the norm for horror movies, what happens to the Golden Age monsters like Dracula, Wolfman and Frankenstein's Monster? 'Screamland' answers the question!

Created by Harold Sipe and Hector Casanova, 'Screamland' brings together all of the classic Universal monsters, fighting to make a living in today's jaded world. The first mini was published by Image in 2008, followed by another in 2011. This torrent includes both series.

Thank you scary much creators and scanners! Get it, seed it!
